sqlset.sql: select EName,CName from ChatRoomUsers where RoomID=[param] and LeaveTime is null

select Syllabuses_id, CPB_Syllabuses.term_id, CPB_Syllabuses.class_id, print_id, Syllabuses_date, Syllabuses_AP, Syllabuses_activity_id, Syllabuses_activity_name, Syllabuses_course_id, Syllabuses_course_name, Syllabuses_teacher_id, Syllabuses_teacher_name, Syllabuses_ClassRoom_id, Syllabuses_ClassRoom, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, Class_Name, Term_Name from CPB_Syllabuses left join CPB_Class on CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=CPB_Class.class_id left join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_date>='[param1]' and Syllabuses_date<='[param2]' [param3]

select Syllabuses_id, CPB_Syllabuses.term_id, CPB_Syllabuses.class_id, print_id, Syllabuses_date, Syllabuses_AP, Syllabuses_activity_id, Syllabuses_activity_name, Syllabuses_subject_id Syllabuses_course_id, Syllabuses_subject_name Syllabuses_course_name, Syllabuses_teacher_id, Syllabuses_teacher_name, Syllabuses_ClassRoom_id, Syllabuses_ClassRoom, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, Class_Name, Term_Name from CPB_Syllabuses left join CPB_Class on CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=CPB_Class.class_id left join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_date>='[param1]' and Syllabuses_date<'[param2]' [param3]

select Syllabuses_id, CPB_Syllabuses.term_id, CPB_Syllabuses.class_id, print_id, Syllabuses_date, Syllabuses_AP, Syllabuses_activity_id, Syllabuses_activity_name, Syllabuses_course_id, Syllabuses_course_name, Syllabuses_teacher_id, Syllabuses_teacher_name, Syllabuses_ClassRoom_id, Syllabuses_ClassRoom, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, Class_Name, Term_Name from CPB_Syllabuses left join CPB_Class on CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=CPB_Class.class_id left join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_date>='[param1]' and Syllabuses_date<'[param2]' and CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=[param3]

select Syllabuses_id, CPB_Syllabuses.term_id, CPB_Syllabuses.class_id, print_id , Syllabuses_date, Syllabuses_AP, Syllabuses_activity_id, Syllabuses_activity_name, Syllabuses_course_id , Syllabuses_course_name, Syllabuses_teacher_id, Syllabuses_teacher_name, Syllabuses_ClassRoom_id , Syllabuses_ClassRoom, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, Class_Name, Term_Name from (CPB_Syllabuses inner join CPB_Class on CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=CPB_Class.class_id) inner join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_date BETWEEN '[param1]' AND '[param2]' AND CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=(SELECT SS_Student.ClassID FROM SS_Student WHERE SS_Student.STDNo='[param3]')

select Syllabuses_id, CPB_Syllabuses.term_id, CPB_Syllabuses.class_id, print_id , Syllabuses_date, Syllabuses_AP, Syllabuses_activity_id, Syllabuses_activity_name, Syllabuses_course_id , Syllabuses_subject_name Syllabuses_course_name, Syllabuses_teacher_id, Syllabuses_teacher_name, Syllabuses_ClassRoom_id , Syllabuses_ClassRoom, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, Class_Name, Term_Name from (CPB_Syllabuses inner join CPB_Class on CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=CPB_Class.class_id) inner join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_date BETWEEN '[param1]' AND '[param2]' AND CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=(SELECT SS_Student.ClassID FROM SS_Student WHERE SS_Student.STDNo='[param3]')

select Syllabuses_id, CPB_Syllabuses.term_id, CPB_Syllabuses.class_id, print_id , Syllabuses_date, Syllabuses_AP, Syllabuses_activity_id, Syllabuses_activity_name, Syllabuses_course_id , Syllabuses_course_name, Syllabuses_teacher_id, Syllabuses_teacher_name, Syllabuses_ClassRoom_id , Syllabuses_ClassRoom, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, Class_Name, Term_Name from (CPB_Syllabuses inner join CPB_Class on CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=CPB_Class.class_id) inner join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_date BETWEEN '[param1]' AND '[param2]' AND CPB_Syllabuses.class_id=[param3]

select Syllabuses_free_id, CPB_Syllabuses_free.term_id, Syllabuses_free_date, Syllabuses_free_ap, Syllabuses_free_course_id, Syllabuses_free_course_name, Syllabuses_free_teacher_id, Syllabuses_free_teacher_name, Syllabuses_free_ClassRoom_id, Syllabuses_free_ClassRoom_name, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, sum_score, effective_count, Term_Name from CPB_Syllabuses_free left join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses_free.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where CPB_Syllabuses_free.Syllabuses_free_id IN (SELECT Syllabuses_free_id FROM CPB_Syllabuses INNER JOIN CPB_Syllabuses_free ON CPB_Syllabuses.Syllabuses_date=CPB_Syllabuses_free.Syllabuses_free_date AND CPB_Syllabuses.Syllabuses_ap=CPB_Syllabuses_free.Syllabuses_free_ap WHERE CPB_Syllabuses.Syllabuses_activity_name LIKE '%Ñ¡ÐÞ¿Î%' ) AND CPB_Syllabuses_free.Syllabuses_type=0 AND Syllabuses_free_date>='[param1]' and Syllabuses_free_date<'[param2]' [param3]

select Syllabuses_free_id, CPB_Syllabuses_free.term_id, Syllabuses_free_date, Syllabuses_free_ap, Syllabuses_free_subject_id Syllabuses_free_course_id, Syllabuses_free_subject_name Syllabuses_free_course_name, Syllabuses_free_teacher_id, Syllabuses_free_teacher_name, Syllabuses_free_ClassRoom_id, Syllabuses_free_ClassRoom_name, bAttendance, BeginTime, EndTime, sum_score, effective_count, Term_Name from CPB_Syllabuses_free left join CPB_Term on CPB_Syllabuses_free.term_id=CPB_Term.term_id where Syllabuses_free_date>='[param1]' and Syllabuses_free_date<'[param2]' [param3]
select ClassRoom_id,ClassRoom_name,CardMathineIP from CPB_ClassRoom where ClassRoom_name='[param1]'
